text:
We are incredibly grateful to Matrix Math Hougang Tuition Center for their outstanding support and guidance that led to my son achieving excellent results, securing an AL1 in Mathematics!

The tutors are highly skilled, patient, and dedicated, tailoring their teaching methods to meet the needs of each student. The lessons were engaging, well-structured, and focused on building a solid understanding of core concepts while also preparing him thoroughly for the exam.

The regular feedback and practice tests were invaluable in identifying areas of improvement and boosting his confidence. It's clear that the team is genuinely invested in their students' success, and the results speak for themselves.

Thank you so much for helping my son excel – we couldn’t have done it without you! I highly recommend this center to any parent seeking top-notch support in Mathematics.

My child has greatly benefited from the lessons at Matrix Maths and kudos to teacher Xing Rong and Hui Yun who have taught and motivated her throughout the years. My child has seen improvements in her maths and finally achieved AL1 for PSLE.

Matrix Math's materials are structured and that helps students to understand concepts better. Teacher Chloe connects well with the students and helps to build my child's confidence in Math. Previously, Math was her least favourite subject but since attending lessons at Matrix Math with Tr Chloe, it's now her favourite subject! Thanks Matrix Math and Tr Chloe, for helping to build a strong foundation as we navigate primary school Math!

Kudos to Teacher Xinrong for her dedication in coaching my gal who scored AL1 in PSLE for Math this year. Matrix Math@ Hougang has prepared my child very well for PSLE especially for Paper 2. The tough questions that came out during PSLE were "no stranger" to my child as they were taught similar concepts during lessons in Matrix Math.

My girl has been with Matrix Maths for 2 years. She managed to score AL1 for maths this year. Really like to thank Teacher Xinrong for coaching her these 2 years. Without her help, I don’t think she will attain such good result.
